name: Power Maze
description:
This game was made for Mini-Jam 73, a 72-hour game jam, and the first one I have ever participated in and submitted to.

The theme of the game was POWER with the limitation of 5 COLORS.

The game aims to navigate the various mazes to find the switch/button to restore the power. Each maze is timed, so you can keep notes and try to beat your previous time.

The game uses only the colours Black, White, Dark Grey, Red and Green. I chose these colours at random, then worked them into the game as I developed it.  I decided to make a puzzle/maze game because I wanted to keep my first submission simple, as I am also still learning in college.

I have created a Google form for feedback: https://forms.gle/FXHWgpF2YAFN9aT87

Thank you for reading and hopefully, you decide to give it a try!
